hadith.text: Abd al-Rahman b. Yazid reported:I met Abu Mas'ud near the House (Ka'ba) and said to him: A hadith has been conveyed to me on your authority about the two (concluding verses of Surah al-Baqara. He said: Yes. The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) (in fact) said: Anyone who recites the two verses at the end of Surah al-Baqara at night, they would suffice for him
